title: Les beaux malaises
overview: Les beaux malaises is adapted from a Canadian series. Les beaux malaises is a comedy series in which we find 6 major characters:- Franck the successful humorist but a little arrogant and manipulative while being touching- Anne, Franck's wife, is not impressed by her husband's notoriety. She's the confidante. She decided to do couples therapy to keep the fire going.- Emma the couple's daughter is 9 years old: full of character, good student- Leo the son: he adores playing soccer with his father. He is full of life.- Monique, Franck's mother: she likes to look younger, she is divorced from Franck's father. She is proud of her son- Christophe, Franck's macho friend: they've known each other for 30 years. He's a ladies' man.- Jean Fran√ßois says JF: he works in IT, he's a bit of the gang's deadpan. He's a little naive.
